entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mauricie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:37 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.8°C

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High plus 2.

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near plus 1.
